title: Capstone Project: Autonomous Humanoid - Fetch a Beverage
description: This chapter presents the culminating capstone project: developing an autonomous humanoid robot capable of understanding a high-level natural language command and executing a complex sequence of actions to "fetch a beverage from a simulated fridge." This project integrates concepts and technologies from all previous chapters, including ROS 2, Isaac Sim, AI perception, navigation, and Vision-Language-Action (VLA) pipelines.
